description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'NoteEditor' used for editing notes in a user interface. It manages rendering, styling, and user interactions for a note editing panel, including handling note data, delete actions, and text input management.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component for editing notes, with properties for dataProvider and onDelete actions, internal state management, rendering logic, and input handling.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Asynchronously saves the updated note data using the provided dataProvider, updates internal state upon success, and displays a toast message on failure.

methods.name: _setTitle
methods.description: Updates the title text of the note and optionally saves the change.

methods.name: _setBody
methods.description: Updates the body text of the note and optionally saves the change.
